title: Usage Guide
text:
Login tab: email + password
Settings button: set Host/IP, Port, Username, Password, Database; tests and saves to .env

title: Usage Guide
text:
Login tab: email + password
Settings button: set Host/IP, Port, Username, Password, Database; tests and saves to .env

title: Usage Guide
text:
Sign Up

Roles: Admin, Coach, Captain, Mentor, Competitor
Captain requires existing Team ID
Admin/Coach auto-login; others require approval

title: Usage Guide
text:
Dashboards

Admin: Manage teams, approve/reject users, change roles, delete users, view audit log.
Coach: Create/join teams, view members, approve join requests, activity log.
Captain: Checklists, READMEs, Notes; Team Members with Approve/Reject for competitors; Join Requests (pending badge).
Member/Competitor: Checklists, READMEs, Notes; Join Requests.

title: Usage Guide
text:
Workflow

Team creation by coach auto-assigns coach
Approvals propagate via repositories
Alembic migrations keep schema updated

title: Installation
text:
Install Docker Engine:

sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y ca-certificates curl
sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(. /etc/os-release; echo $VERSION_CODENAME) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-compose-plugin

Start MySQL:

mkdir -p ~/cyberpatriot-backend && cd ~/cyberpatriot-backend
cat > docker-compose.yml << 'YML'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: cyberpatriot_runbook
      MYSQL_USER: cp_user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: your-strong-password
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: your-strong-root-password
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    command: ["--character-set-server=utf8mb4", "--collation-server=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci"]
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
volumes:
  db_data:
YML

docker compose up -d

title: Installation
text:
Install Docker Engine:

sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y ca-certificates curl
sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg
echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(. /etc/os-release; echo $VERSION_CODENAME) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-compose-plugin

Start MySQL:

mkdir -p ~/cyberpatriot-backend && cd ~/cyberpatriot-backend
cat > docker-compose.yml << 'YML'
services:
  db:
    image: mysql:8.0
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      MYSQL_DATABASE: cyberpatriot_runbook
      MYSQL_USER: cp_user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: your-strong-password
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: your-strong-root-password
    ports:
      - "3306:3306"
    command: ["--character-set-server=utf8mb4", "--collation-server=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci"]
    volumes:
      - db_data:/var/lib/mysql
volumes:
  db_data:
YML

docker compose up -d

title: Installation
text:
Frontend (Windows/macOS/Linux)
git clone https://github.com/michael6gledhill/cyberpatriot-runbook.git
cd cyberpatriot-runbook
pip install -r requirements.txt
set DATABASE_URL=mysql+pymysql://cp_user:your-strong-password@SERVER_IP:3306/cyberpatriot_runbook
alembic upgrade head
python main.py
Tips: - Use .env to persist DATABASE_URL. - Escape special cmd characters: ^&, ^|; avoid ! or set via .env.

title: Features
text:
Create by Coach/Captain; items include name, description, steps
Item status: pending/completed/skipped; notes per user

text:
READMEs

Team documentation; upload/view; author attribution

title: Features
text:
Notes

Personal notes per user; optional encryption

title: Features
text:
Join Requests & Approvals

TeamJoinRequest workflow for joining teams
Admin/Coach/Captain approvals per role

title: Features
text:
Audit Log

Track actions: approve/reject/change role/delete/readme/note updates

title: CyberPatriot Runbook
text:
Welcome to the CyberPatriot Runbook documentation.

Desktop GUI built with PySide6
MySQL backend via SQLAlchemy + Alembic
Role-based dashboards: Admin, Coach, Captain, Competitor, Mentor

Quick links: - Installation: {{< link "installation.qmd" >}} - Usage Guide: {{< link "usage.qmd" >}} - Feature Overview: {{< link "features.qmd" >}} - Database Schema: {{< link "schema.qmd" >}}
Repository: https://github.com/michael6gledhill/cyberpatriot-runbook
Publishing: - Install Quarto: https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/ - Render locally: quarto render - Preview: quarto preview - GitHub Pages: enable Pages with source set to gh-pages or use Actions.

title: Database Schema
text:
Users: id, name, email, password_hash, role, team_id, is_approved, is_active, timestamps
Teams: id, name, team_id, division, created_by_user_id, timestamps
Checklists, ChecklistItems, ChecklistStatus
READMEs: team_id, author_user_id, title, os_type, content
Notes: team_id, author_user_id, title, note_type, content
AuditLogs
TeamJoinRequests: team_id, requester_user_id, team_creator_user_id, status, message

title: Database Schema
text:
Users: id, name, email, password_hash, role, team_id, is_approved, is_active, timestamps
Teams: id, name, team_id, division, created_by_user_id, timestamps
Checklists, ChecklistItems, ChecklistStatus
READMEs: team_id, author_user_id, title, os_type, content

AuditLogs
TeamJoinRequests: team_id, requester_user_id, team_creator_user_id, status, message

title: Database Schema
text:
Relationships

Team has many Users (members); User belongs to Team
Team has many READMEs and Notes
ChecklistStatus links User to ChecklistItem
JoinRequests link requester to team creator and team
